name: Terminal_Hacker (SimsimArab)
description:
What If You Can Hack Into A Place You Want?

This Is A Puzzle Game That You Have To Solve The Scrambled Word And Get The Password To Hack The Place You Want.                                                                                Its A Short Fun Game.

Player Experience :                                                                                                                                                   -Trying To Hack From An Old School Terminal.

Have Fun :)

                                                                           --VERSION (1.1)--
